mapper.sql: num,writer,title,content,stars,walker, TO_CHAR(regdate,'YYYY.MM.DD AM HH:MI') AS regdate,imagePath, orgImageName, saveImageName, ImageSize, startRowNum, endRowNum, prevNum, nextNum
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (num, writer, title, content, stars, walker, regdate,imagePath,orgImageName,saveImageName, ImageSize) VALUES(review_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, #{stars}, #{walker}, SYSDATE, #{imagePath}, #{orgImageName}, #{saveImageName}, #{ImageSize})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM ( SELECT FROM review ORDER BY num DESC ) result1 ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
